name: microboot
description: Boot up your app in wee little modules with the help of glob.

scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec --require test/bootstrap/node test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Jack Williams <jack@tagstr.co>
